name: Christie Wallace
text: We had a great experience tonight. Delivery was fast and the delivery driver Susan was awesome! The person who took our order was very helpful. I believe her name was Brittany!ðŸ˜Š

name: Joy M
text: Had to come here tonight because of issues at other pizza hut. SO glad I did. This place not only had my order, the correct order, but i didn't have to wait 30+mins. Guy at the window was amazing, i believe his name was Rooster, but this is my new hut. Thanks guys!!

name: The Gaming Devil
text: On Oct,6 2020 at 7:27 PM Pizza hut was SO kind to me and my brother they went the extra mile and delivered all the way out to my house and when I was a little short on cash they paid the extra $2 in my opinion Pizza Hut is infinitely more â€¦More

name: Keith
text: Got me for the last time.  Ordered pizza online and was told it would be ready in fifteen minutes.  Needless to say it has been 45 minutes and I am still currently in parking lot waiting on my order.  IF YOU CANT FILL ONLINE ORDERS IN A â€¦More

name: Kim Ruka
text: Place an order online to pickup at 430. Got there 10 minutes before order wasn't even in the oven yet got told I'd have to wait 20 minutes. 2nd time I've order from this location and same issue happened the first time. Last time I order from this location.

name: Destiny Sturgess
text: Between the 2 locations in Athens, I prefer this one. I'm about equal distance between the 2. Not being an eat in location makes the service seem faster and better. I prefer pizza hut to domino's any day because domino's always messes my order up regardless of how I place my order. With pizza hut, I don't ever have an issue.

text: Went to order delivery.  I live inside city limits,  2.2 miles from the store. I see they dont deliver to my home so I call. A VERY RUDE girl answered. I asked if that was possible to deliver here she stated that she didnt know but I could â€¦More

name: A Rose
text: I like to give folks another chance if they mess things up or are slow, but gah, this place is consistently slow, consistently gets the order incorrect, pizzas not cut all the way and has terrible/slow service. There are other pizza places in town, I will go there in the future.

name: Michael Austin
text: Worse customer service ever. Always is. I'll go to dominoes from now on. I ordered on app, 2 pizzas and dessert. Waited more than the alotted time then went to the window, paud for it (since it clears off their timed order list) and then â€¦More

name: Deborah S Epperson
text: We love this place. Our waitress is amazing. She does the entire lunch rush all my herself. And does it well. High five to her. Her name is Mitzy. But 65 temp is to cold for a restaurant. It was freezing in there. Please turn the heat up. We like to come there but not when you freeze to eat.

name: Ashley Murray
text: They were the worst pizza place I had to deal with. The delivery guy shows up late. Then when I give him a twenty he says he did not bring change. I take my pizza back to them to exchange for what I ordered and to get my no less wing and â€¦More

name: Daniel Smith
text: Low quality pizza due to not caring by employees. Will order from other store in town. Pizza not being cut all the way. Pizza stretch too thin causing crust to be hard. Stay away!

name: B
text: One of the best Pizza Hut locations I have been to. Always an accurate order, and quick delivery or wait time. The pizza is always over the top

text: They are nasty ..just found a long hair in my pizza ...i called they get smart with me like i did it ...they really should shut them down

name: Cecelia White
text: Business has gotten a lot better at this pizza hut on 72. Pizzas are coming out hotter and better than ever. Plus one of the pizza delivery guys are really fast and always kind. Definitely recommended.

name: Jacob Patterson
text: Good pizza, and friendly service. However, sometimes the pizzas appear to be served in a rush and as such the quality sometimes dips below my expectations, happening often enough to warrant this three-star review.
